cause.description:
Shaun is not rich therefore he cannot take out the $21,000 loan his school is asking of him. It is the job of this cause to make up for some of that money so that he is not in debt 4 years from now.
1. Every man should go to college.
2. Every black man should have a chance.
3. Black colleges do not give enough financial aid.
cause.mission: Get money so that Shaun can make it to college in fall 2007!
cause.name: I need money because I'm broke and cant go to college without it
